t: Scaling a CPG Brand in 2022 & Beyond with Mark Edmonson, CMO at Materne North America, GoGo squeeZ - Suzy
s: In this episode, Mark Edmonson, CMO at Materne North America, GoGo squeeZ, joins Suzy Founder and CEO Matt Britton, to explore how these shifts play out in the real world. Mark is responsible for revamping iconic brands like Old Spice, Gillette, Campbell Soup Company, Febreze, and Henkel.
